name: Tief
description:
Tief A stealth thieving experience Controls

W A S D - To move

CTRL - To crouch

Q/E - To lean

LMB - To attack

Instructions

The objective of the game is to get all three pieces used to build a vehicle to defeat a beehive outside your home. To get them you will rob others in this first person stealth experience.

The game starts you off on the first level, then you will return to your base to leave your loot and by heading out again you will enter the next level. There are a total of 3 levels and an ending. You will be able to use a weapon too if you can find it on each level.

Credits

Designer - Tortitas

Programmer - Tortitas

Musician - Sr. Edgelord

Most assets - Sr. Miziziziz Retro 3D Graphics Collection
